trends: There have been no other sightings in Oxford
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting Details On Saturday August 24th witness was spending the weekend with herboyfriend at his home at the Villages in Oxford area.They were both asleep when she was suddenly startled and woke up. Shelooked over at the clock and it was 01:30 am. She was feeling very anxious. As she glanced over towards the doorway she saw asilhouette. It was of a "being" that she has seen before. The beingstands approximately four feet tall, has a large head for its heightand long arms that hang down approximately two feet. She wanted to wakeup her boyfriend John, but couldnt get herself to move. She feltparalyzed. The being was continued to look at her. She "felt" asthough being wanted her to come towards it. This event seemed to lastten minutes. Although she can not be sure how long it lasted. Sheclosed her eyes for what she thought was a short time and when shereopened them it was gone. Everything seemed normal and she eventuallywent back to sleep.
